text: Marcel Gerard Pelletier (December 6, 1927 in Drummondville, Quebec - May 13, 2017 in Cherry Hill, New Jersey) was a Canadian professional ice hockey goaltender who in the National Hockey League for the Chicago Black Hawks and the New York Rangers. He played most of his career with the Victoria Cougars of the Western Hockey League. ==References== * * Category:1927 births Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Disease-related deaths in New Jersey Category:2017 deaths Category:New York Rangers players
title: Marcel Pelletier
